content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is an EPAM training material, intended for EPAM employees onboarded to P&G Account only.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"这是一份EPAM 培训材料，仅供加入宝洁项目的 EPAM 员工使用.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You received the assignment because you are member in P&G project based on your UPSA profile.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"根据您的 UPSA 个人资料，您是 P&G 项目的成员，因此您收到了该培训.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By entering this training, you acknowledge that you are authorized according to your role(s) on one or more project within the P&G Account and that you do not share or misuse the training material you have accessed or downloaded. You further acknowledge that by entering this training you expect no privacy from monitoring.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"参加此培训，即表示您承认根据您在宝洁帐户内的一个或多个项目中的角色，您已获得授权，并且您不会共享或滥用您访问或下载的培训材料。您进一步承认，通过参加此培训，在监控下，您对隐私没有期望。\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If your profile is obsolete or misconfigured, exit immediately and contact your Resource Manager to update your UPSA profile accordingly.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"如果您的项目信息已过时或配置错误，请立即退出并联系您的RM以相应地更新您的 UPSA 文档。\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
